amendment.description: To eliminate a provision relating to the distribution of launches for phase two of the acquisition strategy for the National Security Space Launch program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2418 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2418 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195) To eliminate a provision relating to the distribution of launches for phase two of the acquisition strategy for the National Security Space Launch program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2418 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2418 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301.
